thread.title: 5 Pictures Of Yesteryear Actress Madhubala, To Remember Her On Her Birth Anniversary Today
thread.title_full: 5 Pictures Of Yesteryear Actress Madhubala, To Remember Her On Her Birth Anniversary Today

title: 5 Pictures Of Yesteryear Actress Madhubala, To Remember Her On Her Birth Anniversary Today
text:
facebook 356 SHARES 
Today happens to be the 84th birth anniversary of the stunning actress, Madhubala. Acting in over 70 films in her short career, Madhubala was iconic, and always will be. Not just because of her breathtaking beauty, but because having come from humble beginnings, she made a huge name for herself (one that is still carrying), in an industry as unforgiving as Bollywood. She was, and always will be, a superstar in all our eyes. Here are five pictures to remind us so, on her birth anniversary. Image credit: Getty Images/Thinkstock
